I've bought a LOT of Panasonic products in my life and may change my review afterI hear back from customer care but I remain unimpressed with anything that breaks this soon. Big letdown.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Horrible Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Melissa M. Belmonte
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera for a couple of days.  Still love the camera.  But Panasonic sent me a battery charger that was not working.  So once the battery died, I couldn't use the camera anymore.  And I have called Panasonic 7 times now, waiting on hold for over 30 minutes each time, and nobody has been able to legitimately help me.  A week after starting these calls, they still haven't sent me a replacement charger.  So, like I said, I love my camera, but I don't think I will ever purchase a Panasoic again, because the customer service is atrocious.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC FH 20 14.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Mitchell "Patricia"
Reviews.Content: this camera is a great size, fits easily in a case or pocket for fast use. The pics are clear. Even in the dark, the pics come out great. I am still getting used to using all the features, but I like this camera a lot...not a bad price for this camera, either.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Linda A Boucher
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but I will buy an additional battery. I recently went to a rock music concert and I did take quite a few pictures using the zoom setting. The battery symbol was flashing at the end of the night. I did take over 200 pictures though so I am not sure how long the batrery would last with or without the zoom setting or if that would make a difference.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, Great HD Video
Reviews.Author: K. Manship
Reviews.Content: Haven't bought a camera in a few years but everything seems to work as described.  The HD video is great!  It looks better than my current Mini-DV video camera.  I thought it allowed me to just hold down the button and take multiple pictures but it doesn't appear that is the case.  Overall, takes good pictures and the HD video is awesome, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice but ok
Reviews.Author: Whirling World "Traveler"
Reviews.Content: nice camera but I feel the color of pictures are a bit "off".  I am not a fan of the LCD viewer-when it's bright outside, I can't see what I'm focusing on so it's a crapshoot what I'm taking a picture of.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: phoenix2000
Reviews.Content: This is ok for a point and shoot.  Easy to use. Lousy for anything further away than a few feet, even using the zoom.  Get better pictures on my phone.

Reviews.Title: Defective shutter scratches camera lens!
Reviews.Author: AAyers
Reviews.Content: I've had the Lumix for a while and have been pleased with it until I recently noticed several fine vertical scratches on the lens (some are more like a dashed line ----). Each photograph, especially those where I've aimed into any kind of light source, have hazy white lines in the center of the photo. I couldn't figure out how I could have scratched the lens since the cover retracts automatically when it's not on. I am very careful with my camera and keep it in a lens case when being carried around. A little research turned this up: http://www.amazon.co.uk/Lens-scratches/forum/Fx39Y385WF8RDUQ/Tx1ZBKB3Z7Z73R8/1?_encoding=UTF8&asin;=B001T0H0RG. Apparently lots of other people have had this this issue. The scratches are due to a defect in the camera shutter which scratches the lens each time it closes. When I listen closely I can hear it making contact with the glass. I called Panasonic and spoke to Otis, a supervisor in their Camera Repair dept. and, as expected, he told me that I'd have to return it for repair at a cost of $128. He said "defect or not, it's out of warranty". And that's that. I will not be returning it for repair at that cost, of course. Nor will I ever buy another Panasonic product.

Reviews.Title: Replacement camera
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Insley
Reviews.Content: Action speaks louder than words, and this purchase was an exact replacement of a camera I used for several years. It's an excellent camera, produces excellent images, and stood up to all but the most extreme abuse. (Inadvertently, I left the original camera in a pocket of a pair of dirty coveralls and then beat the coveralls against a brick wall repeatedly to get the dust and dirt out.) My new camera was delivered on schedule, was packed appropriately, and was in good working order.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Lorraine
Reviews.Content: I've had this for a while now and it takes great pictures.  The only reason I did not give it a 5 star rating is because you cannot take repeat pictures - the time between is a bit long and I have missed a couple shots because of it.  However, with that said, the quality of pictures is wonderful, the ease of use is wonderful.  Great camera.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Curtrenton "Jodi Hamilton"
Reviews.Content: This is just great camera.  Easy to use, a good price and very handy to have at any time..  I bought it for me and I use it all the time.  The price was right and I would buy from this seller again..

Reviews.Title: Camera Panadonic
Reviews.Author: Conservative Right Winger
Reviews.Content: Great sellet received item just as described.  Would highly reccomend this seller. By the way if you want s great point amd shoot camera you cannot go wrong with the Panasonic DCM line.

Reviews.Title: Good little Camera
Reviews.Author: Martha
Reviews.Content: This camera has been with me wherever i go, and it has held up good.  The picture that it takes are crisp and nice looking.  The only thing is the battery life could have been a little better, other than that no complaints!

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Blyth
Reviews.Content: This camera is Easy to use..it takes great pictures...and it is a nice, compact size...I especially like the large viewer screen

Reviews.Title: Our Honeymoon Camera
Reviews.Author: I. Mullis
Reviews.Content: This thing has a special place in my heat because we bought it for our honeymoon, but it isn't perfect.  The pictures are great. The battery life is great. It is light. The zoom is excellent.  It does OK in low light.  My only real beef is the battery.  You have a separate battery charger to charge this thing on, and the replacement batteries aren't cheap. So if you take a lot of pictures and you burn through your batteries you  can't charge it on the fly, and you can't stop in a buy batteries at a convenience store.  Also the charger is one extra piece you can loose.  There are some pretty nice Nickel Metal AA and AAA batteries out there that would have worked great for this application.  But they stuck with a proprietary battery.  Do I recommend it? Yes.  But I can't help but be a little disappointed because it was so close to perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Mrs. Rita Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: The only thing that would make me love it more is longer battery life.  I find myself reaching for a dead camera often.  But the picture quality is great, and it's easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Go To Camera
Reviews.Author: A. Staten "AS"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to avoid having to take the Digital SLR to Europe, it fit the bill. I was able to capture my entire trip without regret, now I keep this camera in my purse because you never know when a photo opportunity will present itself.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: I've had this for 2 years now and it's still working just fine. I suppose these things are becoming somewhat outdated by phones with cameras but this still has a good edge over phones with plenty of features for getting those better-quality snaps.

Reviews.Title: Display stopped working
Reviews.Author: Peter James
Reviews.Content: Display just stopped working a few months ago.  The product has never been dropped or exposed to water.  It is completely useless now.  It did work okay for a while, so consider this a duration review.  So two stars is for the short time that it worked.  (Yes, the warranty is over, although barely)

Reviews.Title: Perfect for photos and videos!
Reviews.Author: A. Rosado "alohagyrlstar"
Reviews.Content: Besides being a fun color, it is absolutely perfect! Great small size with a great zoom. It's very clear and sturdy and has nice features. The videos also turn out very well for being primarily a photo camera. I actually use this more than my actual video camera just because it's compact and user-friendly! It's been a great product overall.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: DJMSK
Reviews.Content: I found the Camera to be very good. Ease of operationwas good I like the rechargeable battery feature.Although this item was used, it was in very goodcondition

Reviews.Title: Absolutely outstanding camera for the size and price
Reviews.Author: Tokyomitsubishi
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera I have ever had. I am a young man, not super serious about photography, but I don't want to make garbage either. This camera gives you the flexibility to take professional looking photographs when you want to, and packs the capabilities in a small and mobile package. When I ordered my camera, it did not come with a case, however, I advise ordering one. They're cheap and will protect your investment. Perhaps the only slight inconvenience with this camera is that you cannot zoom the lens while recording video; you must first zoom in and then start recording video. If you start recording, then decide to zoom, you must stop recording, then zoom, then go back to recording. The designers may have made this decision to avoid the camera recording a loud "ZZZZZZ" noise as the electric motor moves the lens. This does not affect me and my photography style. I have made a couple videos with this camera, and the near HD quality is quite satisfactory to me. With an 8gb flash card, I have more space than I know to do with. I recommended this camera to my brother, and got him a 16gb card. I have no idea what he's going to do with all the space. If you want to see some sample video taken with this camera, copy and paste what follows the colon:  [...]

Reviews.Title: Great camera for great price
Reviews.Author: "Eco" Adam
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this camera. It takes excellent quality pictures, has a great zoom, is very portable, and is quite user-friendly. Also, the display is excellent and the battery lasts pretty long. I would highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: S. Marshall
Reviews.Content: I don't know too much about cameras and choosing the right one based on features, I just wanted a small, simple camera that would take decent pictures without a lot of hassle. When I first got the camera, it didn't take long to figure out how to take a picture, change the scene mode or go to the video mode, view pictures, etc. And I love the quality of the pictures, they almost look professionally done. With my previous camera, I didn't feel like the different scenes (sunset, portrait, night scenery, etc) made a whole lot of difference with the pictures. With the Panasonic Lumix, I can really tell a difference, specially with the sunset mode. Also, with my previous camera, pictures without the flash would be blurry and out of focus; that is not the case with the Panasonic Lumix.I can't really go into the specifics and features, etc since again I'm not sure what a lot of it means; however, if you're like me and you're just wanting a small, easy to use camera that takes great quality pictures, you should definitely consider getting this camera.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: misfitsailor "Tim"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, versatile.  It's been over a year and I am as happy about this purchase as day one.  It is very user-friendly, and does more tricks than I may ever need.  Others have bought this camera after seeing mine!

Reviews.Title: Awesome in every way
Reviews.Author: HappyJA
Reviews.Content: Great point and shoot camera-- loaded with features and really simple menus to make the whole seem greater than the some of its parts. This is my second Panasonic camera. I've also had the similarly sized Casio and Canons. In the first case, the product durability was not as good as the Panasonic; in the latter case, the software and menus are more difficult to use.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased with camera.......Panasonic is awesome
Reviews.Author: Jackfrost
Reviews.Content: I think I have had this camera about two years.  I have been really pleased with it in that the pictures are not of the very very highest quality but they are certainly very good.  The camera is simple to operate and overall is very exceptional for a rather inexpensive camera.  Approximately a month ago it stopped working, giving an error warning.  As I wasn't sure what that meant, I contacted Panasonic.  After talking to me briefly, they determined that I needed a new camera.  I had no sales receipt but of course did have a product number.  They promptly returned me a new camera including  a new battery, new charger, new memory card and a case.............too boot.  Go Panasonic.............I think I'll stick with you!

Reviews.Title: One of the best in digital camera market !
Reviews.Author: Sharp
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera a year ago as a gift for my loved one and she absolutely loves it. The picture quality is great. I was skeptical about the "user-friendliness" of the camera as she was using it for the first time but she found the functioning pretty smooth. The features included in the camera such beach, sepia, etc are absolute fun and great way to capture in various light exposure. The best part is the 8x optical zoom with 14.1 MP camera. With the price i bought, this is the only high brand and high quality camera which provided 8x optical zoom. Rest everyone provided 3x or 4x zoom only. Personally, i like Sony cameras but even they didn't provide this feature ! I am emphasizing on this feature because to me, the zoom capacity is one of the utmost important feature in a digital camera. The body color (red) is enchanting and unique. Bottom line, this camera is worth the price ! (My review is based on some shots i personally took and more on the reviews provided by my fiancee after she used it)

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: David A. Ayotte "Dedicated American"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter after learning that she has a habit of losing or breaking them. Well, she loves this one and treats it like it should be treated.  She has taken at least 1,000 photo's with it and it works great.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Convenient
Reviews.Author: joan f. grenke
Reviews.Content: Doesn't have a view finder so taking pics in the sun is difficult.  Not sure if it's worth the money.  Had one I bought for about $65 that was just as good.  Very glad it's only a second camera. Still playing with it, may change my mind.  Hope so.

Reviews.Title: One year after buying this camera
Reviews.Author: Mingmei
Reviews.Content: I have owned this camera for exactly a year now and I am more than satisfied with my purchase.I actually spent only about $140 last year buying this camera (after reading hours of hours of reviews), so the higher price now on Amazon is a reflection of how great this camera is.So anyway, I won't pretend like I know a whole bunch about digital cameras. But I will tell you my opinion from the perspective of a 20-year-old college student.What I like about this camera:-Most bang for the buck you'll find. The 8x optical zoom feature was really important for me.-Vivid red color. Outside does not scratch easily (I have yet to find a scratch/imperfection, and I leave it in my purse on long day trips all the time.) Nice shape. Perfect size (smaller is not always better) for my hands-Large LCD screen, easy to use buttons.-Very, very nice HD video quality. The sound quality is surprisingly good too. I have used it to record live a capella singing. Amazing! Get a large memory card and you'll be using this camera as a camcorder.-Battery charges very quickly and lasts through 300+ pictures on average.-Really clear colorful crisp pictures in the sun. Better than my old Canon camera most of the time.-Lots of settings. Can take very impressive pictures of night scenery. Unexpected and impressive!What I don't like:-Some pictures taken inside may appear a tiny bit grainy at times in certain settings. This may be due to the fact that I'm still not completely familiar with all the settings yet... there are just so many!I can't even think of anything else! I would say image quality can be better, but that is unrealistic for a point-and-shoot. If you want something with the BEST image quality, get a SLR instead. BUT if you want something for <$150 with great optical zoom and fits in your pocket, this camera is PERFECT.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: The camera is compact and easy to use.  I carry it in a small case that fits on my belt so that it is easily accessible.  I have taken it with me on several trips and the pictures are very good.  I use it mostly in the "intelligent auto mode".

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera, Bad Customer Service from Panosonic
Reviews.Author: L & C's Mommy
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It is very simple to use, and takes great pictures.  I am a part-time photographer, and have professional equipment; but who wants to drag that around with two kids?  I was looking for a small point and shoot that still took great pictures.  This one was rated highest of ones under $200, and I was not dissapointed.  After owning the camera for 10 months, somehting happened with the screen, and it was half black.  I had purchased an extended warranty for it, but was referred to Panosonic since it was less than a year old.  I went through the process with an "online repair request", and sent the camera in.  I got a email saying they had received it on July 6th, and the exchange was in process.  Today is July 26th, and no one can tell me why I haven't heard anything else.  I think 20 days is a long time for a simple exchange.  No one could say why it was taking so long, but that it was in process (you don't say, I can read that).  The people are very polite with their clueless answers though.  I hope I get it back in the next 10 days for vacaion!!  But besides the Panosonic repair issue, it's a great camera.

Reviews.Title: it's been great
Reviews.Author: T. Graves
Reviews.Content: very convenient camera with good quality pictures. no issues with anything on it. video is decent with reasonable audio although picture quality does suffer when using the zoom feature.overall this has been a good purchase and the pocket size means we have been using it more often than our old cameras

Reviews.Title: Super Point & Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Texas T
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera. It takes sharp pictures even in low light. Intelligent Auto mode is great in addition to the many settings to be creative in the the other auto and manual modes. I am very pleased with this FH20 camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic product
Reviews.Author: Jerry Phillip Call
Reviews.Content: I'm new to all of this tech stuff and I wanted a easy to use digital camera. My wife bought me this one for fathers day and I couldn't be happier with it. It is very easy to use, the pictures are clear and sharp and the camera works itself! It comes ready to use, just slip in the two batteries provided and set it up: Time stamp if you want it, and any other options and your ready to go! I was snapping pictures in about 2 minutes. Fun, easy to use, great picture quality, and a great price, just over a hundred bucks.

Reviews.Title: The BEST Digital Cameria I Have Ever Owned
Reviews.Author: M. Lundy
Reviews.Content: I am a female in my late 50's & I am at a point in life that I am tired of learning new software over & over as electronics quickly upgrade. This is the fourth digital camera I have purchased & the only one I have ever been really satisfied with.  I absolutely love the rechargable battery & charger included. I have never run the battery down. You can make this camera as simple or as complicated as any amateur might want.

Reviews.Title: Great and easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Wes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera about 4 months ago and it's been working beautifully!  Nice size display for viewing pictures. It's very easy to use w/ the auto intelligence.  It's taken many wonderful pictures for our family trips and parties...  Couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Larry J. Sawyer "birdman"
Reviews.Content: Compact, easy to use, self focussing/adjusting in all environments- everything we were looking for. Didn't rate Customer Support because we've never needed it.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: Me-Myself-AndI
Reviews.Content: I'm not a photographer so I can't give a true review. But for the price this seems to be a nice camera and video recorder. It's not to small but still small enough to carry easily, the button are large enough even for man fingers to operate. :)

Reviews.Title: Happy with camera. Inside flash could be stronger
Reviews.Author: buckaroo
Reviews.Content: After careful research I chose this camera. Works well. If you are taking all inside pictures that require a flash I would research another camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Rance
Reviews.Content: I had a $600 cannon and this little thing actually takes better pictures.Very easy to learn.  I never even looked at the manual.Good indoor shots.

Reviews.Title: Boo
Reviews.Author: Boo
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Lost original and bought again. Doesn't have as many bells and whistles as some cameras but easy to operate and takes excellent pictures. Just right for me.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: M. Watson "Mom with kids"
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted in a camera.  Mother of two that do not stand still so its a great camera on the go and when they are on the move.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic pocket sized camera
Reviews.Author: tommasso
Reviews.Content: Great size, lens & mega pixels.Didn't come with a memory disk like I thought it was supposed to.

Reviews.Title: love this camera
Reviews.Author: boop
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because a friend had one. Hers takes a lot of use and abuse and she hasn't had any problems. She needs something very user friendly so I figured if she could operate it, I could too. I have been so pleased with the ease of use. I love the size (fits in a pocket). The price was $300 less than the  digital camera we bought years ago. It's a treat not to have to look through a tiny view finder. I don't worry about damaging or losing an "expensive" camera now and yet it performs like one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: So far so good. Only had it since x-mas but very pleased with it. Don't take a lot of pictures but it's very easy to use, nice pictures, and battery lasts a lot longer than a day, BIG plus. Gonna get an extra (some day) just to have but it doesn't take long to charge though. I've shopped around for a while till I found this one, was looking for a higher zoom, a good battery life, good reviews and not too expensive, and this one fit the profile. I recommend it highly!

Reviews.Title: Mediocre camera
Reviews.Author: globaltrekkie
Reviews.Content: This is an average camera.  The picture quality is good if you are taking a picture of something that is completely still. Anything else is going to be blurry.  I have also tried to order prints bigger than a 4x6 and recieved an error message fron snapfish saying the quality would not be good.  The camera is also too bulky and you cannot switch features quickly, causing you to miss out on photo opportunities.  The black and white feature is cool.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: dylan
Reviews.Content: This an amazing camera it is thin good amount of optical zoom 14.1 MP and a low price.I got this camera as my first and it is great.It is easy to use and great pictures.I would say a great price for such a camera.This camera is also good for traveling because of its size it is smaller than i expected in a good way.I enjoy using this camera and it is a good one.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Little Camera
Reviews.Author: K. Moritz "Caregiver"
Reviews.Content: Wanted a small compact camera that would take great pictures but that I could just keep in my purse. This is it!!!! I was toying with the idea of getting another Canon camera but I liked the reviews on this one and I am not a bit sorry that I got it. Pictures are so clear, no red eye, I am older and shake a bit and this camera allows for that. I would recommend this camera to everyone I know, I am thrilled with it.

Reviews.Title: Used item sold as new.
Reviews.Author: P. Kott "kozmikbooks"
Reviews.Content: This is supposed to be a brand new camera. The package had been opened and there were fingerprints all over the LCD and camera! I am not pleased with Amazon on this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: S C
Reviews.Content: Overall the camera gives excellent result. The indoor photos sometime results into overexposure or uneven lighting effect (due to flash) but that may be due to not using correct built-in scene mode or options.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Spencer B. Skolnick "PoiZn"
Reviews.Content: So I ordered this camera after going over many different cameras(maybe like 20). I wasn't sure if I was going to like this camera because there were many great reviews, but the bad ones scared me(such as a red or yellow hue or grainy etc.). What I can tell you now though is I am glad I purchased this camera. The picture quality is so crisp and clear. After I take a picture and zoom in on it I can see every little detail(like I took a picture of my cat and I could see every single hair). I can only think that the people who gave it a bad review got a faulty unit. The only problem I have with it which is not really a problem but it is slightly bigger and not as stylish looking as my previous camera the Nikon Coolpix S630, but that is just me griping over nothing.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Lezly's Mommy
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after reading the customer reviews.  It's a nice compact camera and exactly what I was looking for in terms of image quality and optical zoom.  No complaints from this happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix FH20 - Gotta Love It!!
Reviews.Author: G. Frohnert "TWH4Gail"
Reviews.Content: I'm about as un-techie as a person gets. I needed a point-n-shoot camera that would take decent pics and mini-movies, be easy to upload pics on my computer, easily carried in my pocket so I can take lots of pics when riding my horses on trail, etc. After reading up reviews on all cameras in the $100-200 range, decided to go with the FH20. I'm so glad I did!! This camera is SO EASY to use - very intuitive, and the pictures are GREAT! I'm literally having a BALL with this camera and taking pics of EVERYTHING, inside and outside. I'm boring everyone to death with all my pictures, but I can't help myself!! It's so freaking easy to use - and the pictures come out so well, that you'd think I knew what I was doing!!  :O  Oh, and I love the jaunty red color... Bottom line, this camera met and exceeded all my expectations.  And if you knew me, you'd realize this was very high praise, indeed.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
Reviews.Author: Celia K. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Just the camera I have been wanting! Does everything at the touch of a button, in a small size.Easy to use with self explanatory screens.Easy and comfortable to carry.Takes awesome picture in low light.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: Have only used the camera for a few days now but the out of the box and a good charge I was taking pictures. Guess  that says it the the "Ease of use".So far the picture quality is excellent, even when compared to my digital 35mm Pentax.No need for customer support as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for everyday use
Reviews.Author: kivachica
Reviews.Content: I've really enjoyed using my camera for everyday photos and for vacation pics.  The menu functions are really easy to navigate through, and the external buttons are simple and straightforward.  I've captured some good pictures due to the stabilization feature, and highly recommend this camera to others.

Reviews.Title: Inconsistency rules!
Reviews.Author: Jamie L. White "fiction addict"
Reviews.Content: I will return this camera although I desperately wanted to like it. And there are things I like about it, but when it comes to the bottom line, which for me is 4x6 photo quality, it left me angry and frustrated. I had a chance to take indoor shots in my home and have them developed before I went to see my family in St. Louis for the holidays. Those first shots were very nice, although I had to use the "enhance" color adjustment on the machine at Walgreen's on ALL of them to get prints that had enough contrast. In my parents' home I encountered weird coloration on the LCD screen in many scenes where I was taking two photos of the same scene in a row. Not rapid fire. One pic would look like the correct color on the LCD screen and the next would be markedly orange-ish. In one group shot of four adults, the first shot was fine, but the second (with enough time in between shots for us to change places) had a gray blob in the middle of my sister's dark green shirt. I had not downloaded the software before traveling - figured I'd just use intelligent auto setting, since that's what I used at my home, with good print results. Most of the indoor shots taken on my trip had a noticeable yellowish/orangey hue. Outdoor shots were fine. This camera was voted by Digital Camera HQ as the best point and shoot of 2010. Did I get a lemon?

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20 Review
Reviews.Author: Louis Staffaroni "dago2me"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera the day before Christmas Eve because my Wife's old camera stopped working. We haven'g bought a new camera for at least 5 years or more. My wife is very particular and I was somewhat reluctant to buy her anything she did not see in person. I could not pass up the deal Amazon was giving. Free Overnight shipping and a price I could not resist.I read about 25 of the reviews and decided to take the chance. I ordered it. I've been shopping with Amazon for a long time and I knew that an exchange, credit or refund was simple.Well, the camera was on my door step that afternoon. She was in the kitchen when I came in with the package. I gave it to her with a "Merry Christmas." When she opened it and saw that is was a camera and a Red one, I knew I had done the right thing.This screen was bigger than her Old one and when I showed her the features it had, she just loved it.We needed to charge the battery and get to the family's house for Christmas eve. We just needed to be able to take pictures and then check on all the features the camera had. We set it on the IA mode and off we went. Well, the pictures were superb. She is pleased so far and so am I. As soon as we use more of the features, I will add to this review.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20 review
Reviews.Author: gooch
Reviews.Content: Photo taking easy.  Editing photos tedious.  Would like to be able to compare original and retouched photos side-by-side.  Have not found a way to do that, if there is one.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Gabi
Reviews.Content: We have the camera for almost 4 months now and we highly recommend it.The pictures come out very nice. The large zoom is great, although a stand may help once reaching maximum zooming.There are plenty of configurations to pick from, but the automatic mode does the job very well.The battery comes with a charger, which is much better solution than the AA batteries that we had in our previous Canon camera.The price is cheaper than similar cameras of Canon or Nikon while the pictures are great; bottom line great value for money.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Louise George
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take pictures at my son's wedding.  It is very easy to use, and the picture quality was excellent!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Quality, even at Night
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: I am really satisfied with this camera. I was looking for a point-and-shoot camera that I can carry on trips. I mainly take pictures of family and touristy things while travelling. I am not using the camera for any fancy artistic shots. At first I loved the zoom. I was amazed at how well the picture looked at 8x zoom. Now I love the picture quality, especially at night. I took a picture of the Space Needle at night and I love how clear the picture is. I really like using the Auto Intelligent setting. I like how the pictures still looks crisp even if I zoom in on my computer to see something up close. Great for a point-and-shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix digital camera, 12x zoom
Reviews.Author: Dev
Reviews.Content: Very light.Very easy to use, my 5 year old takes good pictures with it.Very good videos and pics both.Small enough to fit in pocket.

Reviews.Title: A sharp little jewel
Reviews.Author: David J. Osborne "DaveO"
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera after decades of dedication to 35mm.  I love its convenience and quality.  It's wonderful to carry this in my pockets (jeans and cargo types), take photos, see right away if they're worth keeping, and then go home and print just the ones I like, which turn out with great color and clarity.  The Lumix has a sharp lens, smart and quick functions, and it's gorgeous.  There's a certain quality I still love and prefer about my 35mm photos, but the instant, convenient production of this little gem is a joy.  I also learned that the internal memory of the camera holds as many as 25 photos, but when I added a 4GB class 10 memory card, I was amazed at the increase in capacity and in speed of taking and accessing photos.

Reviews.Title: panasonic lumix dmc-fh20
Reviews.Author: shorty
Reviews.Content: bought this for myself.  so far so good.  i took pictures of the leaves changing and of the kids outside and items inside, just to see if i liked the picture - and i did.  keep trying to find something i don't like about the camera - but i can't find anything.........

Reviews.Title: Lumix DMC-FH20.
Reviews.Author: Rodney J. Fink
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera.  It is easy to use, has a good viewfinder and a nice wide-angle coverage.  Makes taking pictures a snap.  Quality is excellent and I consider this camera to be a good value.

Reviews.Title: Awesome camera
Reviews.Author: TheView
Reviews.Content: This is a great product.  I was going to buy a Sony, but after looking at the pictures taken with this camera I was amazed.  I would recommend it to anyone looking for a good camera with a good price.  Picture quality is great, battery life is good as well.  I'm very glad I bought this one.

Reviews.Title: Was - A Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Yellowstone "Yellowstone"
Reviews.Content: WARNING - NOT A GREAT BUYI took only 648 pictures, then camera went 'DEFECTIVE'.  The image on the screen turned various shades of blue.  But the images, when printed were good.  (Something haywire between the screen display and the logic circuitry).  I researched the symptoms online and found others who had the same problem.I immediately called Panasonic.  They are very helpful in troubleshooting.  However, once everything was exhausted - They said, "we will like-for-like it with a comparable refurb for $128.00, or you can buy another at list".I think this is a bit disingenuous - but things are beginning to tighten up with all retailers.ORIGINAL POST RATED MUCH HIGHER:This camera is a replacement the 10meg I lost.  I have experienced little difference between the 10meg vs the 14 meg - but time will tell.I am happy with either of these two - has just enough exotics programmed in it to keep me rereading the manual on days I cannot get outside.

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased
Reviews.Author: tbandwb
Reviews.Content: This product has lived up to my expectations.  I wanted a small camera to put in my purse to capture those unexpected moments.  It is extremely easy to use.  I love the fact that I can shoot short video clips as well as great stills. I love the optical zoom.  For the money, this is a great camera!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera
Reviews.Author: Duane Pename "D."
Reviews.Content: Perfect point and shoot camera. I had a different camera that was similar, but took poor quality photos in low light. This one works perfect.

Reviews.Title: camera performance
Reviews.Author: Danielle
Reviews.Content: so far the camera has been working extremely well. i took some pics at an event which had poor lighting and my pics looked way better than some pics taken by other cameras at that same event. It isn't perfect but all in all this camera is DEFINITELY WORTH 5STARS.

Reviews.Title: Great point and shoot camera
Reviews.Author: R'sider
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera in advance of a vacation to Washington DC.  So easy to use my 8 year old was taking many of our photos.All the pictures came out sharp and clear, and the Auto feature worked really well.  Couldn't be more pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: rncher
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as I wanted a small, easy to use digital camera to carry in my purse. This camera is a perfect size - small, but does not feel cheap. The first time I used it was at my daughter's candlelit wedding. Considering the lack of natural lighting, it did a very good job. I have been able to see pictures taken by other cameras at the same event, and mine did just as well or better. It is simple to use and I look forward to using it as my travel camera. A lot of camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: bharkey "brenda"
Reviews.Content: Love the 8x optical zoom which was hard to find in a small camera.  Can fit camera in my small pocketbook easily.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic's point and shoot Lumix-DMC-FH20 camera
Reviews.Author: Marg
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this camera very long, but when I have used it, it took really good pictures. I am a 70 year old woman who knows very little about cameras, but so far I haven't had any problems using it. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
Reviews.Author: Tis the Truth
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this camera because it received such good reviews.  Haven't really had a chance to use it, but the pictures I have taken thus far have been good.  I also have a Kodak Easyshare with viewfinder that I've had for years and the one thing I miss about the Panasonic is not having a viewfinder.  The Lumix has a fast recovery time which I like.  All in all, I'm very satisfied with the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures, Easy to Use
Reviews.Author: K9Mom "Love To Read"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera based on other reviews and I wasn't disappointed.  It's so easy to use and takes great pictures as well.  Just easy to understand.  The movie feature is an added bonus too.

Reviews.Title: Orange hue just in time for halloween
Reviews.Author: Seth Cramer
Reviews.Content: Every picture I took with it upon trying it out for the first time had an orange/red hue to it. I only used the Intelligent auto mode as I am not a sophisticated camera user (just a point-and-shooter). Thus, I did not attempt to mess around with any settings. While the close-ups were great, all the indoor shots looked out of color. Outdoors may be fine, but I want a camera that gives nice pictures in all settings. Immediately returned it.

Reviews.Title: Eh, Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: ArmyWife
Reviews.Content: So I purchased this camera, just to have another one around. I currently shoot with a Nikon D90, and I own a canon powershot. I was intrigued by the MANY positive reviews and bought this camera, although I normally stick with canons and nikons. anyways, the picture quality...it's horrid. everything had a yellow tint, regardless of setting, light, motion, or anything. photos shot with a zoom were grainy. so much motion blur even on sports mode. none of the settings made a difference with the quality. I understand, this camera is NOT going to shoot the same as my SLR, and it's not going to have the same quality, but I expected SO MUCH more out of it. I'm a freelance photographer in my spare time and I understand this camera is not for something like that, but honestly, come on panasonic. I'm very disappointed.  I'm returning it tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: Daniel Night "Do to others as you would have ...
Reviews.Content: How anyone can give this thing a rating above two stars is beyond me, the thing takes grainy pics mostly, although every now and then a beautiful one will come out, on macro at least. Far away pics are blah to bad (but I suppose good in comparison to even a 1080p webcamera), and the anti-shake is awful. Night pictures you need a nightstand with and must totally avoid any shakes to avoid light blur. How can this thing be so bad with 14.1 mps? I like that you can make it pretty silent for the most part though, that's something never to forget when making a digital cam, is to make it so you can keep it silent. The menu system is kinda bizarre compared to what I'm used to from other digital cams I've used, and I've used at least four other types.

Reviews.Title: Great P&S;, but it ends there.
Reviews.Author: D. Adams
Reviews.Content: What this camera is...  It's a very small point and shoot camera with a very powerful zoom.  It's great for quick little pictures and even some nice HD videos here and there.  All in all it's very easy to pick up and use (stay out of the menus!)What this camera is not...  It is not a prosumer camera.  It has almost no manual features, and the ones it has are very crippled by software (such as limiting exposure speeds to 1/4 in normal mode).  The menu layout is rather confusing as well, with a hoard of "scenes" that are all but useless.I got this camera as a gift to supplement my dSLR.  I wanted something that was well rounded and would be easy to just grab and shoot.  This works great if you leave it all on auto.  However, I've gotten where I prefer shooting without a flash.  This camera is more than capable of doing so.  ISO800 has quite low levels of noise, coupled with the optical stabilizer and some steady hands, you could get some pretty decent shots.  However, the only way to get such shots is to hope some scene mode has a shutter speed within the range you need.  VERY annoying.Oh, another little tidbit about this camera...  There's no aperture setting.  I guess I'm just too used to higher end cameras.  Basically it's whatever the lens is zoomed to.  There is no diaphragm in the camera.  This isn't a bad thing, I just figured it'd have something...even a single ring as I've seen some cameras have.Eh...but quirks aside, I really like this camera.

Reviews.Title: Almost Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Wipf
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews before purchasing this camera, so I felt very comfortable with what to expect and not to expect from it.  My only disappointment is that the viewing screen does not give one a clear picture as to how ones prints will turn out.  You sometimes have to just guess if the picture will be ok or not when you print it.  Sometimes they view dark or fuzzy, but print out fine.  Other than that, I love this camera!  I love the zoom, shutter speed, ease of using the features...very "consumer friendly".  It was a great value for the money!!

Reviews.Title: JUST BOUGHT
Reviews.Author: J "IRISH THORN"
Reviews.Content: EASY TO USE BUT HAVE NOT HAD LONG ENOUGH TO RATE BATTERY LIFE OR CUSTOMER SUPPORT.LIKE THE BATTERY RECHARGING CAPABILITY AND PUCHASED A FLASH CARD THAT SHOULD LAST FOR YEARS.DID NOT COME WITH A FLASH CARD SO HAD TO WAIT TILL I BOUGHT ONE TO USE.GOOD BUY AND I RECOMMEND.

Reviews.Title: Good photos without thinking
Reviews.Author: SRC "crazy about books"
Reviews.Content: I have not put this camera through a rigorous testing yet, but so far I am impressed with the crisp and clear photos I get with the intelligent autofocus.  It does better than I do when I make my own selections.  It is easy to tuck in my purse and fun in red.

Reviews.Title: I returned it!
Reviews.Author: Judith Piazza "Mosaics and Book Fan"
Reviews.Content: Well I have just returned this camera--I guess that tells the story.  I bought this camera to just take pictures. I used it for the first time  last night, Christmas Eve and was so dissapointed this morning when I went to review them. The color was very yellow except when I was up close to the person. The focus time is a long 5 seconds and by then everyone had moved. I have now gone back and ordered  my tried and true Cannon sure shot. I was just ready to try something new and liked the red color, it is not enough reason to keep a camera that does not take good family pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Aarti Subramanian
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera before going on vacation. I have to say I am extremely pleased with my purchase. Its compact, very easy to use and picture quality is great. I have not had the opportunity to use the video mode yet so can not comment on that. I am not a professional but like taking good quality photos and was impressed with the array of preset options that come built-in to the camera.

Reviews.Title: Outdoor Pictures are GREAT ... Indoor are not .
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take with us to the beach last summer and most of the pictures I took then are Great!! However, I have never been able to get a good indoor shot. They all seem to have a yellow tinge to them and aren't ver clear. It could very well be a setting or something I'm not doing right but I haven't been able to figure it out...yet.

Reviews.Title: I am sure once I get one that works I will love it.
Reviews.Author: cbear "Loving my Kindle 2"
Reviews.Content: Well I bought the camera but immediately had to send it back to Amazon.  After waiting over an hour for the battery to charge... the LCD on the back did not work.  You could see very very faint marks of something but nothing.  Looked all over the web and customer support for a fix, but nothing it was a bum camera.  So now waiting for the new one. I did stick a SD card in and take a few "guess where I am pointing the camera" shots.  I got a couple of my mini doxen.  They were clear nice pics when I put them on my laptop.  So it does take great pics.  I mainly got the camera for a purse camera. I am a Nikon DSLR user but sometimes I see some thing and don't have my big camera with me, so I got this camera. Loved the size and the color.So once I get a new camera from Amazon, I will give a update review.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20
Reviews.Author: JER
Reviews.Content: I recently acquired this camera and immediately took it on a trip to Europe.  Easy to use, great pictures with very good detail.  I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: mohamed bahi
Reviews.Content: This camera takes really good photos.  I am very pleased.  Shipping was fast.

Reviews.Title: BROKEN ALREADY
Reviews.Author: Kristine
Reviews.Content: I liked this product quite a bit. It took nice pictures for the price. However, it has been three months and it is already broken! Every time I turn it on it says "Lens error: cannot focus" and I have to turn it off. I have in NO WAY abused this camera. It has never been dropped or mistreated at all. Since the last time I used it it has just been sitting on my desk, perfectly fine, no reason I can think for it to suddenly develop an error. Now I have to send it back to the manufacturer and deal with all that. What a disappointment.

Reviews.Title: In my third camera: Great camera but not without its problems
Reviews.Author: tania
Reviews.Content: My camera stop working three months into owning it and just pass the point I could return it to the store.  I bought it at Costco.  The lens cover will not open or close properly.  I started the warranty process online instead of speaking to a person and it was pretty straight forward.  I send the camera back in my dime and received a new to me refurbished camera pretty quick.  Within two days of having the refurbished camera I notice the screen flashing (light) in the off position.  Today I called Panasonic instead of doing the warranty service online.  When I called I got disconnected once but the person that answer then second time helped me. I went through the same process I did on the computer just answering a few questions.  The person in the phone said that I will need to send my camera back again to get a new replacement and that she would email me the new work number and a shipping label via email.  Not sure if this mean they are paying for the shipping this time.  Customer service was ok but I think I like doing the process online instead because I got instant confirmation.  Now I am waiting on an email that hopefully this customer service person took my information right and I will receive everything just like she said.  So now after I send my camera back I am getting a new replacement.  This will be my third camera and I just hope the last one.  This experience definitely makes me weary of buying panasonic products.  I have owned Pentax digital cameras before and I never had a problems like these so quickly into the ownership of the product.  I was contemplating buying another panasonic product but now I am not sure if I will.  The Lumix DMC-FH20 is a great camera but only when is working properly which is not a great percent of the time.

Reviews.Title: What a dud
Reviews.Author: flamingogirl
Reviews.Content: Wow, who knew a camera could be so bad? I bought this camera to take with me to NASA for the launch of the Shuttle Discovery. Boy was I glad that I took my back-up... my old beater camera, a Canon Powershot sd1000 that has been thrown around, dropped & still takes great pictures. I bought this Panasonic because it has a better zoom and is newer technology. I could not get this camera to take a clear shot to save  my life. If there was ANY kind of motion, it was blurred. And it took photos where there was a fuzzy glow around everything- whether it was on auto or on the prescribed setting for that particular photo. I played around with the camera for a few days before going to NASA, and couldn't get a good photo any time I tried it. Plus, the manual could not have been less helpful. There was no information about different setttings, etc. At least my Canon came with a nice manual that had great tips, suggestions, and information. Needless to say, it's in a box and getting returned tomorrow. What a DUD of a camera.

Reviews.Title: Sweet Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Romance Lover "Sucker for Romance"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera to carry around.  Be warned, however, that you must buy an HD card for this camera; otherwise it hold only eight (8) photos!

Reviews.Title: Must pay $40 for written instructions!
Reviews.Author: Notso Happy
Reviews.Content: I did my research, i.e., read reviews, Consumer Reports rating, etc. and looked forward to receiving my camera, along with an additional case and expanded memory card. So far, I only have one big problem The Operating Instructions are on a supplied CD-ROM which for some reason will not download on my computer. The description of this software advises of at least eight situations where it may not download, or work, including "some personal computers cannot be used." Lengthy talk with Panasonic Customer Service and referal to a Supervisor, left one option (I did not want to go thru returning the camera case and memory card, not bought from same co.) The  written version of the CD-ROM was purchased for over $40 incl. tax and shipping. "Demand" might be heavy as it is back ordered. I may be sending all of it back if I do not end up with a useable product. No more Panasonic for me!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't justify the top sellers list
Reviews.Author: C. Vemuri
Reviews.Content: I got this camera as it is on Amazon's top seller list and reviews were great, to start with i already have Canon 4 year old SD550, thought it is time to upgrade for higher resolution, IS and HD video. what a dissappointment1. Pictures in auto mode in same lighting conditions are not as good as my 4 year ond canon.2. HD Video: I have i phone 4, and video is not any better than my IPhone4 video or some cases it is worse.I am not a proffessional, most of the time take pictures with Auto mode or use predefined scenary modes for different cnditions, not happy with fh20, this is not for ametures, dont know about professionals.

Reviews.Title: An OK Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Kauffman
Reviews.Content: It is not a good camera, or a bad camera. If you want a camera with a high megapixel count and no other good features, this is your buy. It will do exactly what you want it to do, take pictures. The 8X zoom is ok but not good and the UI takes some getting used to. I do not really recommend because for $10-$20 more you can get a much better camera. I ended up returning and getting http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0035JD0DW/ref=oss_product for $168 but if you want a smaller camera there are better ones of those for this price range.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: HereKittyKitty
Reviews.Content: So far, I LOVE this camera, but I haven't gotten to play with the special features yet.  The one thing I did find is that the Image Stabilization is not that great, maybe I just haven't figured it out properly yet, even though I read everything I could about it.  But for the zoom power and the quality of regular pictures, it beats all other cameras I own.

Reviews.Title: Toilet!
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Blawat
Reviews.Content: Plenty of others have bragged about this thing, but I either received a lemon or my expectations are too high...I had a Canon A610.  You rarely had to change the standard picture setting to get consistently good pictures inside or outside.  This camera, you pretty much have to switch all the time to prevent indoor pictures from being ridiculously red.But, here's the killer... It takes about 15-20 seconds to transfer each picture to a PC via the USB cable.  And, with our camera/PC setup, after downloading about 10 pictures, you get an error that says it can't find the remaining picture files on the device for all remaining pics... but if you restart downloading, it picks up where it left off and magically finds them.  So, to get the 200 pictures I have on the camera off of it, I will have to repeat the download procedure 20X.Epic fail panasonic.  Epic.

Reviews.Title: problems, problems, problems
Reviews.Author: Karol J. Angvik "ruby"
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great pictures - when i can find them after downloading on the computer - they are all over the place - my old kodak site, lexmark, panasonic, panasonic 101, panasonic 102, unable to edit, crop, etc after about the first month - don't know what happened but done with it - can never find pictures once downloaded - getting rid of and buying the new kodak easyshare - kodak was my first camera and has streamlined it to being pretty compact now with tons of features.  unfortunately have only had my panasonic a year and hate to have to buy another - but problems outweigh attributes. i liked how kodak stored and filed my pics, all the fun features that came along with it and the ease of finding again, sharing, etc. they've only improved since my last one - sticking with kodak from here on out.

Reviews.Title: battery for Panasonic DMC-FH 20
Reviews.Author: Samuel S. Spradlin "Sam"
Reviews.Content: battery for Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red)Just ordered this camera and wanted a extra batery.  Witch one?Called Panasonic and they said get the DMW-BCF10.Hope this helps.will review camera when it gets here.Sam Spradlin

Reviews.Title: KEEP LOOKING
Reviews.Author: david maderich
Reviews.Content: THE CAMERA WAS A GOOD PRICE AND THE PICTURES WERE SO SO - THE ZOOM WAS GREAT.  HOWEVER, THE PICTURES WERE NOT VERY CLEAR OR SHARP COMPARED TO MY OLD CANON 4201.  ALSO, YOU NEED A FORK OR SHARP POINTY OBJECT TO REMOVE THE CARD FROM THE CAMERA - NOT GOOD.  I RETURNED THE CAMERA AND I WILL STICK WITH CANON.

Reviews.Title: MY BEAUTIFUL NEW CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Barbara Kalinsky "cybermom"
Reviews.Content: GOT TO USE IT FOR ONE DAY AND REALLY LIKED THE EASE OF TAKING PHOTOS.  HOWEVER, ON THE SECOND DAY I FELL IN THE POOL AND CAMERA NO MORE.  MAY BUY ANOTHER OR GET A WATERPROOF CAMERA NEXT TIME!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Sending it back
Reviews.Author: B. Johnston "Datadude"
Reviews.Content: I have owned several point and shoot cameras, the latest being a Casio. When it died I read all of the reviews and decided to try this Panasonic. Maybe I got a bad one I do not know but this camera sucked. The picture quality was awful on inside photos and outside photos. I would compare the pictures to the old disposal film cameras. It will be going back to amazon first thing Monday morning.

Reviews.Title: Panasonic Camera is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jerome D. Litwaitis
Reviews.Content: If you want a great camera?  This is it.  I love it & it takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Not as great as reviewers have made it out to seem
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Keen "elligirl"
Reviews.Content: I was really excited about this camera because of the reviews I read about it from the professionals; however, it was nothing but a pain to use.  I bought it to have a point and shoot with video that would work in the dark at Disney World. Yeah, it must be that I'm not a professional photographer and could not set the settings right because I could not reproduce almost all of the cool abilities that the reviews covered which made this camera sound awesome. My low light pictures are not that great, unless I used the flash. I had it set to Auto and AI almost the entire time. It worked better if I set the settings manually, which you can imagine is not that easy at Disney World. I tried the Fireworks setting and it just made squiggly lines. On auto before going we took a picture of a friend who was sitting on a table he kicked his foot out at the exact moment we snapped the picture and it made him look like an amputee. The entire time since the first day trying to take a picture has been a nightmare. If I push the button, sometimes it takes a picture and sometimes it doesn't and I have to keep trying. It's like there's a sensor and you have to push just right to get it to focus and take a picture or else you have to keep trying over and over for it to take the picture. My husband and child have the exact same problem. The pictures in perfect lighting, without movement, in which we pushed the button just right turned out great!  But I think I would love to just return the camera and get a refund or trade-in for a cannon or something else. I don't know if that's even possible. It's just disappointing.  However, the battery life was awesome! It lasted all day and then we switched out late at night with the backup battery I purchased.

Reviews.Title: Point and Shoot Camera
Reviews.Author: Z X Turbo "Z X Turbo"
Reviews.Content: Cannot comment until after the Christmas holiday as the camera is purchased for a gift.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: Janice Boone
Reviews.Content: I could not load this camera to my PC.  I sought help from Panasonic and it appears to be a discontinued, non-supported product.  I replaced it with a Nikon with which I had no trouble.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1-Megapixel High-Resolution CCD: The DMC-FH20 features a 1/2.33" CCD with effective 14.1-megapixel high-resolution.
2.7" 230,000-Dot High-Resolution LCD: The DMC- FH20 features a 2.7" 230,000-dot high-resolution Intelligent LCD and High-angle Mode.
28mm Wide-Angle 8x Optical Zoom Lens in a Compact Body: The DMC-FH20 features a newly developed 28mm wide-angle high-quality LUMIX DC VARIO lens
Up to 16.9x Extra Optical Zoom: The Extra Optical Zoom uses the center of the CCD to further extend the powerful 8x optical zoom
Sonic Speed AF: The Sonic Speed AF system in the DMC-FH20 has a maximum speed of approx. 0.35 second for auto focusing.
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-FH20 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 8x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red)
